name: Get exercises
description: Проверяет получение списка заданий по course_id через API.

steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Check that length of exercises equals to 1
Check that 'title' equals to 'Model study probably.'
Check that 'description' equals to 'Discover design group responsibility open account. Walk thought history do president. Treat think increase world.'

parameters.name: actual
parameters.value: 'Discover design group responsibility open account. Walk thought history do president. Treat think increase world.'

parameters.name: expected
parameters.value: 'Discover design group responsibility open account. Walk thought history do president. Treat think increase world.'

Walk thought history do president. Treat think increase world.', estimated_time='4 weeks')

parameters.name: schema
parameters.value: {'$defs': {'ExerciseSchema': {'description': 'Описание структуры задания (как возвращает сервер).', 'properties': {'id': {'title': 'Id', 'type': 'string'}, 'title': {'title': 'Title', 'type': 'string'}, 'courseId': {'title': 'Courseid', 'type': 'string'}, 'maxScore': {'title': 'Maxscore', 'type': 'integer'}, 'minScore': {'title': 'Minscore', 'type': 'integer'}, 'orderIndex': {'anyOf': [{'type': 'integer'}, {'type': 'null'}], 'default': None, 'title': 'Orderindex'}, 'description': {'title': 'Description', 'type': 'string'}, 'estimatedTime': {'title': 'Estimatedtime', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['id', 'title', 'courseId', 'maxScore', 'minScore', 'description', 'estimatedTime'], 'title': 'ExerciseSchema', 'type': 'object'}}, 'description': 'Ответ при получении списка заданий.', 'properties': {'exercises': {'items': {'$ref': '#/$defs/ExerciseSchema'}, 'title': 'Exercises', 'type': 'array'}}, 'required': ['exercises'], 'title': 'GetExercisesResponseSchema', 'type': 'object'}
